title: The Reluctant Cougar
description: “The Reluctant Cougar” Despite her reluctance, she just can’t resist. Perfection is the order of the day for 33-year old business woman Victoria Prism. Maintaining her need for perfection is evident in every aspect of life: Perfect wardrobe, perfect hair, perfect apartment, and even the perfect business partner. According to Victoria, her life is perfect. That is, until 25-year old David Chambers comes crashing in, and turns her orderly life, and bedroom, upside down. Will Victoria be able to get past her fear of judgement before she loses the man who may be the perfect one? Giving Victoria new experiences, passion filled rendez vous’, and confrontations with a temptation she can’t resist, this romantic short story will keep you entertained, and begging for more!
author: Cressida Wilkes
